channel.title: A Small Problem
channel.description: I converted the ghorrock spell into veng, with the veng icon..But you still need law runes and water runes to 'cast' it or teleport...which it doesnt do anymore. I can't find out how to change or remove the runes you need because its not a spell in client.java like barrage or earth strike or teleblock..does anyone know how to fix it?

item.title: A Small Problem
item.dc:creator: @Rubinpkz Rubinpkz
item.description:
@Rubinpkz wrote:

i can’t help you sorry, but i got a qeutsion, how do you replace the ghorok teleport icon with the veng icon?

Read full topic
